modName: MOIAF - Mods Of Ice And Fire - ASOIAF Mod
summary: A project to bring weapons and items from the ASOIAF series into Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/4445749-1338494861.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/4445749-1338494912.jpg[/img][/center]

Mods Of Ice And Fire, or MOIAF, aims to bring various weapons and items from the ASOIAF series into the world of Skyrim.

[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/4445749-1338494976.jpg[/img][/center]

- Longclaw: Jon Snow`s Valyrian steel sword. Both 1-handed and 2-handed versions.
- Oathkeeper: The valyrian steel sword given to Brienne by Jamie Lannister.

- All items can be tempered if you have the steel smithing perk.




[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/4445749-1338495007.jpg[/img][/center]

v1.2 (5/31/2012)

- New Weapon: Oathkeeper.
- Added Scabbards for Longclaw and Oathkeeper.
- Added temper recipies for all weapons.

v1.1 (5/3/2012)

- Longclaws mesh and textures has been redone to more resemble the TV show version.
- Added a 1-handed version of Longclaw.
- Balancing tweaks.

V1.0 (4/23/2012)

- Initial Release
- New Weapon: Longclaw





[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/4445749-1338495037.jpg[/img][/center]

- Place the Data folder in your Skyrim installation directory, Which will be located someplace like:
...\Steam\Steamapps\common\Skyrim
And when it asks you to merge folders, say "Yes to all".

- Run the Skyrim launcher, click on "Data Files", and then check the box next to "MOIAF.esp" and press ok.

- You will find the items in a chest directly behind Breezehome in Whiterun. The included screenshot shows you the exact location.




[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/4445749-1338589111.jpg[/img][/center]
Oathkeepers is based on the drawing by the DeviantART user "~nejna"

[b][color=#FBB917]My Other Mods:[/color][/b]
If you liked this, check out my other mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17236]Rumplestiltskin`s Dagger[/url]
author: TheDahaka
